name: tmdcn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))

stmt.origin: simp3bi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ctps))
stmt.pretty: simp3bi(c0 ∈ TopMnd, c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2), c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ TopSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctmd), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd ↔(c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c0 ∈ TopSp ∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctmd), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd ↔(c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c0 ∈ TopSp ∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctmd), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMnd ↔(c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c0 ∈ TopSp ∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2)))
⊣ c1 =(+f ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ c1 =(+f ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)

comment: In a topological monoid, the operation ` F ` representing the functionalization of the operator slot ` +g ` is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)
